definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The invention relates to a system and a method for manufacturing flakes of liquid-based cytology.
sentences.chinese: 本發明是關於一種液基細胞學制片系統以及製片方法。

sentences.english: Moviemakers are using drones to film from the sky.
sentences.chinese: 電影製片人使用無人機在天空裏拍電影。

sentences.english: After studying English ( Afier he studied English), he got a small job at film studio.
sentences.chinese: 學習英語之後，他在一家電影製片廠找了一份小工。

sentences.english: They knew my work as a religious producer in Latin America.
sentences.chinese: 他們知道我在拉丁美洲地區是一名宗教製片人。

sentences.english: He's getting barraged with new scripts every month from filmmakers across Asia.
sentences.chinese: 他每月都會接二連三地接到來自亞洲製片人的新劇本。

sentences.english: During the initial hubbub of publicity, a producer contacted me.
sentences.chinese: 在最初宣傳中，一位製片人和我聯繫。

sentences.english: But Pinewood hopes to break this on Saturday with the Tom Cruise film, which was made at the site in the 1990s.
sentences.chinese: 但是松林製片廠希望在週六打破這個記錄。

sentences.english: The "Snow Flower" producers hope they can change the trend.
sentences.chinese: 《雪花祕扇》的製片人希望他們能改變這個趨勢。

sentences.english: The head of the studio always hated my guts and now he's paying me off.
sentences.chinese: 製片廠的頭一直恨我入骨，現在他要發清工資解僱我。

sentences.english: I took this picture with the owners and executive producers for Shanghai Film Group and Television Production Company.
sentences.chinese: 這張是我和上影集團老闆和製片人的合影。

sentences.english: The fertilization of Tamarix chinensis was observed by means of conventional paraffin sectioning.
sentences.chinese: 利用常規石蠟製片技術，觀察了檉柳的受精作用。

sentences.english: Now it appears it has a studio that will get it into theaters.
sentences.chinese: 現在看來已經有製片廠願意把它推廣到院線。

sentences.english: Walt Disney, the great film-maker, was born in 1901.
sentences.chinese: 沃爾特迪斯尼，偉大的電影製片人，生於1901年。
卡蒂佛是我們的製片人。

sentences.english: The movie makers require dream to manifest more movies;
sentences.chinese: 電影製片商需要夢想來顯化更多電影。

sentences.english: The production unit of the Beijing Film Studio will leave Beijing for other parts of the country to film the exterior next month.
sentences.chinese: 北京電影製片廠攝製組下個月去外地拍外景。

definition: to supervise the manufacture of/to supervise the shooting of films/executive producer (film)
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
